actor_awards.notes: A sophisticated leading man who later became a successful director and television producer. He received Academy Award nominations for 'Night Must Fall' and 'Here Comes Mr. Jordan'. He served as President of the Screen Actors Guild and was the father of actress Elizabeth Montgomery.

filmography.title: Here Comes Mr. Jordan
filmography.role_description: A boxer who is taken to heaven prematurely due to a clerical error and must find a new body to return to Earth.
filmography.plot: A boxer, mistakenly taken to Heaven before his time, is given a second chance back on Earth in the body of a murdered millionaire.

filmography.title: Night Must Fall
filmography.role_description: A charming, baby-faced Irish bellboy who is actually a psychopathic killer carrying a head in a hatbox.
filmography.plot: A charming young man charms his way into the household of a wealthy invalid, but her niece suspects he may be a murderer.

filmography.title: Lady in the Lake
filmography.role_description: The hard-boiled private detective seen only through reflections, as the film is shot entirely from his point of view.
filmography.plot: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired to find a missing woman, leading to a complex web of murder and deception.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Nomination – Grand Prize

filmography.title: They Were Expendable
filmography.role_description: A PT boat commander fighting a losing battle in the Philippines during World War II.
filmography.plot: A PT boat squadron defends the Philippines against the Japanese invasion during World War II.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Sound, Best Special Effects

filmography.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
filmography.role_description: A lawyer who discovers his marriage is not legally valid and struggles to win his 'wife' back.
filmography.plot: A couple discovers their marriage isn't legal, leading the wife to kick the husband out and court other men.

filmography.title: The Big House
filmography.role_description: A fearful young man convicted of vehicular manslaughter who is hardened by prison life.
filmography.plot: A young man convicted of manslaughter is sent to a brutal overcrowded prison where he shares a cell with a hardened career criminal.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Writing, Best Sound

filmography.title: Ride the Pink Horse
filmography.role_description: A bitter war veteran who travels to a New Mexico border town to blackmail a mobster.
filmography.plot: A solitary veteran arrives in a New Mexico town during fiesta to confront a war profiteer who killed his friend.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor (Thomas Gomez)

filmography.title: The Divorcee
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated man who becomes a romantic interest for a newly divorced woman.
filmography.plot: A woman discovers her husband's infidelity and decides to balance the scales by having an affair of her own.

filmography.title: Private Lives
filmography.role_description: A divorced man who unknowingly honeymoons in the same hotel as his ex-wife.
filmography.plot: A divorced couple discovers they are honeymooning with their new spouses in adjacent rooms.

filmography.title: Forsaking All Others
filmography.role_description: A man who leaves his fiancée at the altar for an old flame, leading to a romantic triangle.
filmography.plot: A woman is left at the altar by her childhood friend, but he later realizes he made a mistake.

filmography.title: June Bride
filmography.role_description: A foreign correspondent assigned to cover a small-town wedding with his ex-girlfriend.
filmography.plot: A magazine editor and her ace reporter cover a winter wedding in Indiana, rekindling their own romance.

filmography.title: The Last of Mrs. Cheyney
filmography.role_description: A suave nobleman who uncovers the truth about a charming jewel thief.
filmography.plot: A sophisticated woman poses as an Australian widow to steal a pearl necklace from a wealthy English family.

filmography.title: Rage in Heaven
filmography.role_description: A mentally unstable steel mill owner who plots against his wife and best friend.
filmography.plot: A paranoid man frames his best friend for his own murder to punish his wife.

filmography.title: The Earl of Chicago
filmography.role_description: A Chicago gangster who inherits an English earldom.
filmography.plot: A bootlegger inherits a British title and estate, bringing his gangster ways to the English countryside.

filmography.title: Night Flight
filmography.role_description: A courageous pilot flying dangerous night mail routes in South America.
filmography.plot: During the early days of aviation, a dedicated airline boss pushes his pilots to fly dangerous night missions in South America.

filmography.title: Three Loves Has Nancy
filmography.role_description: A novelist who, along with his publisher, competes for the affection of a southern girl.
filmography.plot: A small-town girl goes to New York to find a man, ending up in the apartment of a publisher and an author.

filmography.title: Yellow Jack
filmography.role_description: A soldier who volunteers for a dangerous medical experiment to find a cure for yellow fever.
filmography.plot: The story of Major Walter Reed's campaign to determine the cause of yellow fever in Cuba.

filmography.title: The Saxon Charm
filmography.role_description: A tyrannical and manipulative theatrical producer based on Jed Harris.
filmography.plot: A talented producer takes a young playwright under his wing but begins to destroy the writer's life with his domineering ways.

filmography.title: Once More, My Darling
filmography.role_description: An actor recalled to the army to help catch a jewel thief by wooing a debutante.
filmography.plot: An attorney turned actor is ordered by the Army to court a debutante suspected of possessing stolen jewels.

filmography.title: Eye Witness
filmography.role_description: An American lawyer who travels to England to clear his friend of a murder charge.
filmography.plot: An American lawyer goes to Britain to defend an old army buddy accused of murder.

filmography.title: Fast and Loose
filmography.role_description: A rare book dealer and amateur detective who investigates a murder.
filmography.plot: A married couple of amateur detectives investigate the theft of a rare manuscript and a murder.

filmography.title: Trouble for Two
filmography.role_description: A European prince who gets involved in a suicide club in London.
filmography.plot: A prince and his colonel get mixed up with a club for people who want to end their lives.

filmography.title: Hide-Out
filmography.role_description: A racketeer who hides out on a farm and falls in love with the farmer's daughter.
filmography.plot: A racketeer hiding from the police on a Connecticut farm finds redemption through love.

filmography.title: When Ladies Meet
filmography.role_description: A journalist in love with a woman who is infatuated with a married man.
filmography.plot: A writer tries to win back his girlfriend from her married publisher.

filmography.title: Mystery of Mr. X
filmography.role_description: A gentleman thief who must catch a serial killer to clear his own name.
filmography.plot: A jewel thief is forced to hunt down a serial killer who is murdering London policemen.
